de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solution

Interface BlindStockSimulator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLotSizingSimulator, StaticDynamicUncertaintySimulator, StaticDynamicUncertaintyWithADISimulator

    public interface BlindStockSimulator
    Classes that implement this interface can simulate and calculate the blind stock for a given solution
    Author:
    Andi Popp
